member.summary: Name of device for which the task was requested.

member.summary: Start time of requested recordings as UTC time.

member.summary: End time of requested recordings as UTC time.

member.name: T:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager
member.summary: Class used for communicating with XProtect Corporate and Expert system in order to request remote recording retrievals. This class only works with XProtect Corporate 2013 or newer.

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.#ctor(VideoOS.Platform.FQID)
member.summary: Construct class with identification of what Management Server to work with.

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Construct class with specific credentials.
Please consider using the more secure version using SecureString for the password instead.
member.param: IP address or name of XProtect Corporate/Expert Management Server
Specify port if available. When set to 0 - default port of 80 is used.
'Domain\Username' for AD and local users, or just 'username' for basic users.
password to be used for authentication
member.exception: thrown when any of parameters is null

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Security.SecureString)
member.summary: Construct class with specific credentials.
member.param: IP address or name of XProtect Corporate/Expert Management Server
Specify port if available. When set to 0 - default port of 80 is used.
'Domain\Username' for AD and local users, or just 'username' for basic users.
password to be used for authentication
member.exception: thrown when any of parameters is null

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.IsConnected
member.summary: Tells whether the manager is connected or not

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.Connect
member.summary: Connects to XProtect Corporate Management Server using credentials provided in .
member.exception: thrown when trying to connect before logging in. Call first.
thrown when trying to login twice or logging in to a version earlier than XProtect Corporate 2013

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from XProtect Corporate Management Server.
member.exception: thrown when trying to disconnect before logging in. Call first.

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the manager

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.Retrieve(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates a remote recordings retrieval task that retrieves remote recordings for given device from the specified time.
member.param: Id of device
start time of recording to be retrieved provided as UTC
end time of recording to be retrieved provided as UTC
member.exception: thrown when user does not have enough rights to retrieve remote recordings from given device. Check XProtect Corporate system configuration.

thrown when or are not UTC times. Also thrown when is not at least 1 ms after . Also thrown when trying to retrieve remot recordings from a device that does not support remote recordings retrieval or does not exist.
thrown when trying to retrieve recordings before logging in. Call first.
member.returns: a object containing information about remote recordings retrieval task

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.Retrieve(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a remote recordings retrieval task that retrieves remote recordings for given device from the specified time. Allows for specifying user name under which the task will appear in XProtect Smart Client.
member.param: Id of device
start time of recording to be retrieved provided as UTC
end time of recording to be retrieved provided as UTC
user name under which the task will appear in XProtect Smart Client
member.exception: thrown when user does not have enough rights to retrieve remote recordings from given device. Check XProtect Corporate system configuration.

thrown when or are not UTC times. Also thrown when is not at least 1 ms after . Also thrown when trying to retrieve remot recordings from a device that does not support remote recordings retrieval or does not exist.
thrown when trying to retrieve recordings before logging in. Call first.
member.returns: a object containing information about remote recordings retrieval task

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.Retrieve(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates a remote recordings retrieval task that retrieves remote recordings for given device from the specified time.
member.param: Id of recording server
Id of hardware
Id of device
start time of recording to be retrieved provided as UTC
end time of recording to be retrieved provided as UTC
member.exception: thrown when user does not have enough rights to retrieve remote recordings from given device. Check XProtect Corporate system configuration.

thrown when or are not UTC times. Also thrown when is not at least 1 ms after . Also thrown when trying to retrieve remot recordings from a device that does not support remote recordings retrieval. Also thrown when recording server, hardware or device with given Id does not exist.
thrown when trying to retrieve recordings before logging in. Call first.
thrown when something unexpected happened.
member.returns: a object containing information about remote recordings retrieval task

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.GetTasks
member.summary: Returns a list of remote recording retrieval tasks for all recording servers connected to XProtect Management Server.
member.exception: thrown when trying to get tasks before logging in. Call first.
member.returns: a list of for all recording servers in XProtect system

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.GetTasks(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a list of remote recording retrieval tasks for given recording server.
member.param: Id of recording server
member.exception: thrown when recording server with given Id does not exist.
thrown when trying to get tasks before logging in. Call first.
member.returns: a list of for given recording server

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.RemoteRetrievalTasks.RetrievalTaskManager.RefreshTasks
member.summary: Refreshes information stored in objects created by this manager.
member.exception: thrown when trying to refresh tasks before logging in. Call first.
